title: Photographs from the Julien Levy Collection
description: This exhibition highlighted Julien Levy’s collection of photographs starting in 1927. Before this exhibition, Levy was most known as and dealer and collector, who had given Max Ernst, Salvador Dali, and others their first shows in New York City. The exhibition contained works by Bernice Abbott, Eugène Atget, Ilse Bing, Brassaï, Manuel Alvarez Bravo, Anton Bruehl, Fracis Bruguière, Henri Cartier-Bresson, Imogen Cummingham, Walker Evans, Watler Hege, André Kertész, Clarence John Laughlin, Alice Lex-Nerlinger, Elit Lotar, George Platt Lynes, Lee Miller, Lucia Moholy, Laszlo Moholy-Nagy, Oscar Nerlinger, Paul Outerbridge, Jr., Roger Parry, Man Ray, Charles Sheeler, Emmanuel Sougez, Ralph Steiner, Maurice Tabard, Umbo.

input: Photographs from the Julien Levy Collection
